anime.name: ATASHIn'CHI
anime.info: A humorous take on the day-to-day life of a "normal" Japanese family. The family in question is the Tachibanis, consisting of a housewife mom, a salary-man dad, and teenager siblings Yuusuke and Mikan.
我們這一家TV版中文官方網站
